attributes.action: Overturn the ban on  Everton fans for encroaching on the pitch at Bournemouth
attributes.additional_details: No on was hurt when fans ran on pitch
attributes.background: After traveling over 190 miles to watch there beloved Everton, the team they adore and support scored what they thought was a wining goal in the 95th minute. There passion and excitement took over them and a handful ran on the pitch to celebrate with players. Everton Fc have now banned them

rejection.details: This seems to have been a decision taken by Everton FC, not by the Government or Parliament. You could write directly to the club to make this request.
